last_episode_to_air.name: The Troubles
last_episode_to_air.overview: When a woman becomes a fugitive, Nina uses her only resource to help find her, her daughter.  Stone's life becomes threatened.

name: New York Undercover
overview: New York Undercover is an American police drama The series stars Detective J.C. Williams and Detective Eddie Torres, two undercover detectives in New York City's Fourth Precinct who were assigned to investigate various crimes and gang-related cases.

episodes.name: School Ties
episodes.overview: Manhattan police detectives J.C. Williams and Eddie Torres are assigned a case dealing with a 17 year old girl who accuses a high school football player of rape. Eddie has problems going to see his mother, who is in the hospital, after six years of non-communication with each other.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Williams and Torres try to prevent two people from becoming part of luxury car theft ring. Williams gets a letter from his ex-wife stating that she wants him to pay more in his maintenance payments.

episodes.name: Sins of the Father
episodes.overview: Torres and Williams investigate an ice-cream vendor's murder whose drug dealings ends up in G's school.

episodes.name: To Protect and Serve
episodes.overview: Torres and Williams are assigned to investigate the death of a student who doesn't seem to be "picture perfect."  Williams deals with child support problems.

episodes.name: Garbage
episodes.overview: Torres and Williams go undercover to investigate a sanitation worker's murder. Sandra is embarrassed J.C. is a police officer.

episodes.name: After Shakespeare
episodes.overview: Torres and Williams deals with a murder and restoring a neighborhood.  Eddie's father moves in with him.  G lies to his teacher.

episodes.name: Tasha
episodes.overview: When a baby dies, Torres and Williams discover there's more to the story then people say.  Torres's sister askes him to investigate their friends missing son.

episodes.name: Missing
episodes.overview: Torres and Williams investigate a missing boy whose mother may know more than she claims.

episodes.name: The Friendly Neighborhood Dealer
episodes.overview: Torres and Williams investigate a drug crime involving a former professional athlete.

episodes.name: Mate
episodes.overview: After a young girl disappears, Torres and Williams go undercover to find her.

episodes.name: The Eyewitness Blues
episodes.overview: Williams protects an eyewitness, while Torres looks for the people who wants to kill her.

episodes.name: Blondes Have More Fun
episodes.overview: Torres and Williams go undercover as drag queens to solve a serial killer case.

episodes.name: Los Macheteros
episodes.overview: Torres is assigned to a case where he has to question his heritage.

episodes.name: Private Enemy No. 1
episodes.overview: Williams is involed in a case where he ends up facing his past. Eddie's sister becomes involved in the case.

episodes.name: The Smoking Section
episodes.overview: A cigarette company tries to destroy a reverend.  Eddie's old girlfriend is being abused.

episodes.name: Mama Said Knock You Out
episodes.overview: Williams and Torres go undercover to try and solve a case where a lethal drug is killing young boxers.  G has to decide betwwen two girls.

episodes.name: You Get No Respect
episodes.overview: A rapper is killed and his partner might be behind it all.

episodes.name: Innocent Bystander
episodes.overview: G eyewitnesses his friends murder.

episodes.name: CAT
episodes.overview: Torres and Williams  go undercover to try and find out what kind of drug crime two dead students were apart of.

episodes.name: All in the Family
episodes.overview: A rich family are part of an illegal gun-selling ring.

episodes.name: Eliminate the Middleman
episodes.overview: Torres & Williams go unercover on a drug case where Torres's father's best friend is part of it.

episodes.name: Olde Thyme Religion
episodes.overview: An occult group is under investigation after one of their followers is murdered.

episodes.name: The Shooter
episodes.overview: Torres and Williams discover that a two time shooter had a personal plot against five people who supposedly ""set him up.""

episodes.name: Manchild
episodes.overview: G is caught between saving his friend's life or telling his father, a cop.

episodes.name: Downtown Girl
episodes.overview: The death of an attorney turns out to be part of a mafia deal. Williams purposes to Sandy.

episodes.name: Catman Comes Back
episodes.overview: With his conviction overturned, Danny Cort is back on the streets.

episodes.name: High on the Hog
episodes.overview: Now physically recovered, Williams is awaiting approval to return to active duty. Torres and his new partner pose as bikers to solve the double homicide of an informant and her little girl.

episodes.name: Tag, You're Dead
episodes.overview: Williams and Torres investigate the case of a Wall Street bond salesman who claims to have shot two graffiti artists in self-defense.

episodes.name: Man's Best Friend
episodes.overview: A man gets killed by a pit bull which causes Williams and Torres to go into the world of dog betting.

episodes.name: Brotherhood
episodes.overview: Williams poses as a freshman to investigate a racially motivated killing on a college campus.

episodes.name: Digital Underground
episodes.overview: Lt. Cooper's daughter ends up missing because of a pedophile she met through email.

episodes.name: Buster and Claudia
episodes.overview: A string of robberies leads to an ex-con and his girlfriend. Torres tries to settle a dispute between his father and a mobster.

episodes.name: Student Affairs
episodes.overview: Williams and Torres pose as a substitute history teacher and a janitor at the high school where a crime was committed.

episodes.name: The Highest Bidder
episodes.overview: Moreno poses as a nurse. to solve a newborn's abduction.

episodes.name: Young, Beautiful and Dead
episodes.overview: Williams poses as a model to investigate the face-slashing of a teen cover girl.

episodes.name: Color Lines
episodes.overview: A serial bomber threatens Williams and Torres.

episodes.name: The Finals
episodes.overview: Danny Cort returns with an agenda for Williams to lose his job and his best friend--and to ""smoke [the officer's] little kid.""

episodes.name: Internal Affairs
episodes.overview: Williams is investigated by the internal affairs division for Danny Cort's death (or murder?).

episodes.name: Bad Girls
episodes.overview: Moreno poses as a prostitute to try to catch a serial killer who Williams wants G to live with him.

episodes.name: A Time to Kill
episodes.overview: After being freed, a policeman's murderer is killed--and the cop's partner is under investigation. Meanwhile, the murderer's girlfriend plots revenge on the gang leader who ordered the officer's death.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.overview: Williams and Torres investigate the murder of a free-lance writer. Moreno gets a visit by her missing husband.

episodes.name: Fire Show
episodes.overview: Moreno poses as a firefighter in order to find out who's responsible for a female firefighter's death.

episodes.name: Toy Soldiers
episodes.overview: Three youths, who were brought from Rwanda to act as mob hit men, are befriended by Father Torres. Moreno gets an inheritance; Williams disagrees with the methods of his son's hockey coach.

episodes.name: Sympathy for the Devil
episodes.overview: When three youths are charged with shooting a couple, one of them insists that, while they robbed the couple, someone else fired the gun.

episodes.name: Checkmate
episodes.overview: A hit man's widow wants to become a soldier in the mob and poses as a police officer to kill a fellow crook in Williams's and Torres's precinct.

episodes.name: Unis
episodes.overview: Lt. Cooper sends two patrol officers to infiltrate a group of corrupt cops When neighborhood dealers starts disappearing.

episodes.name: The Reckoning
episodes.overview: Williams poses as a member of a militant religious group engaged in an ongoing conflict with a religious sect. Torres's father receives devastating news.

episodes.name: The Enforcers
episodes.overview: Williams investigate the murder of his son's tutor.

episodes.name: Andre's Choice
episodes.overview: A fight promoter's death leads to a case involving blackmail, murder, and an ex-con whom Williams has helped.

episodes.name: No Greater Love
episodes.overview: Torres believes the the man who confesses to a killing is taking the blame for his younger brother, who's just received a basketball scholarship to college.

episodes.name: Deep Cover (1)
episodes.overview: Torres tries to gain the confidence of a gun ring's leader. Williams pretends to be a Jamaican who's prepared to place a substantial firearms order.

episodes.name: If This World Were Mine (2)
episodes.overview: A gun-ring leader seeks revenge on Torres.

episodes.name: A Time of Faith (1)
episodes.overview: Harlem churches are targets of bombings.  Eddie tries to help Nina recover from her shot wound. Williams has issues with new comer Det. McNamara. G's friendship with a white person is being questioned.

episodes.name: A Time of Faith (2)
episodes.overview: Williams discover that Rev. Harris may be part of the bombings.  Nina moves in with Eddie.

episodes.name: Tough Love
episodes.overview: Williams befriends a woman whose boyfriend is a leader of a gang that robs apartments.  Eddie asks Nina not to go back to work.

episodes.name: Blue Boy
episodes.overview: A recently released child molester is a suspect of a rape of an eleven year old girl.  G is in trouble at school.

episodes.name: Rules of Engagement
episodes.overview: Nina and McNamara work together on a case where two robbers are murdered.  Nina freezes in battle and decides to turn in her gun. G hangs out with young thieves.

episodes.name: Kill the Noise
episodes.overview: A war happens between east coast and west coast rappers when a california rapper is shot.

episodes.name: Smack Is Back
episodes.overview: Torres's father dies of a drug over dose and Torres believes that it was suicide.  Williams tries to get custody of G.

episodes.name: Don't Blink
episodes.overview: Nina's new undercover case questions her future as a cop.

episodes.name: Without Mercy
episodes.overview: Toress goes undercover at an AIDS clinic to solve a murder case of a bisexual man.  Cooper and Captain O'Bryne start to become closer.

episodes.name: Going Platinum
episodes.overview: Williams goes undercover as a security guard.  McNamara's discovers more of his father's case. Captain O'Bryne confesses his love for Cooper.

episodes.name: Brown Like Me
episodes.overview: Torres and Nina become involved with two feuding Latino gangs.

episodes.name: The Reaper
episodes.overview: Lt. Cooper is taken hostage in her office by a man threatening to blow up the precinct if his son is not reprieved from a death-row sentence.  Nina learns that the daughter she gave up for adoption 11 years ago wants to meet her.

episodes.name: Fade Out
episodes.overview: A thirteen-year-old boy has a videotape of a murder.  Torres and Williams try to protect him; The boy's mother turns out to be Williams's old high-school girlfriend, whom he betrayed by sleeping with her best friend, Chantal.

episodes.name: The Solomon Papers
episodes.overview: Feds may be part of a drug case and McNamara might lose it all to prove it.  Cooper and her husband tell their kids about their separation.

episodes.name: School's Out
episodes.overview: Nina's daughter (whom she gave up for adoption) has been kidnapped and held for ransom.

episodes.name: Outrage
episodes.overview: The detectives have to prove that a Gulf War veteran has stolen missles.  Williams meets with G's french teacher about G's crush on her.

episodes.name: The Promised Land
episodes.overview: Williams discover evidence relating to Martin Luther King Jr's murder.

episodes.name: Descell
episodes.overview: Nina and McNamara go undercover to find out who tried to kill an executive.  Williams and Natasha get close.

episodes.name: Hubris
episodes.overview: A female bounty hunter uses Williams to help find a fugitive in protective custody.  Nina and McNamara suspect a wife a recently deceased cop.  Natasha visits the precinct.

episodes.name: The Unthinkable
episodes.overview: The detectives suspect a mother of being involved in a carjacking involving her two children.  Nina deals with her custody battle for Melissa.

episodes.name: Vendetta
episodes.overview: McNamara goes undercover involving a Chinese Mafia that has a link with his father's death.  Torres asks his sister for money to buy an engagement ring for Nina.

episodes.name: Is It a Crime?
episodes.overview: Williams investigate a case where a girl feel down and elevator shaft in her building.  Torres goes shopping for Nina's engagement ring.

episodes.name: No Place Like Hell
episodes.overview: Willias go undercover at a prison to find evidence that will catch a drug lord.  William's new friend in prison becomes involved in a murder.  Torres purposes to Nina.

episodes.name: The Last Hurrah
episodes.overview: The detectives go after a bank robbery ring. Torres and Nina get married.

episodes.name: Change Change Change
episodes.overview: Lt. Barker recruits JC and Moreno to get the armored-car robber who killed Eddie and MacNamara.

episodes.name: Drop-Dead Gorgeous
episodes.overview: Members of the unit target a modeling agent.

episodes.name: Pipeline
episodes.overview: Agents interfere in an undercover operation aimed at a Colombian drug kingpin.

episodes.name: Spare Parts
episodes.overview: Missing teens prompt a probe of a private hospital's organ-donor program.

episodes.name: Mob Street
episodes.overview: The detectives go undercover on Wall Street to foil a stock-manipulation scheme.

episodes.name: Rat Trap
episodes.overview: The unit probes mysterious fires in the garment district.

episodes.name: Quid Pro Quo
episodes.overview: The detectives discover that the CIA is involved in a money-laundering scheme at a bank in a Cuban neighborhood.

episodes.name: Capital Punishment
episodes.overview: A serial killer gives male victims tainted drugs.

episodes.name: The Unusual Suspects
episodes.overview: Nell's ex husband comes back and ask's Nell for protection from the mob. Nina and J.C. become close.

episodes.name: Sign o' the Times
episodes.overview: Lt. Barker gets involved in a bank robery.  G cathes Nina and J.C. in bed together.

episodes.name: Going Native
episodes.overview: Nina and Stone go undercover as owners of a garbage company.  Nina and J.C. deal with their emotions of sleeping together and G catching them.

episodes.name: The Troubles
episodes.overview: When a woman becomes a fugitive, Nina uses her only resource to help find her, her daughter.  Stone's life becomes threatened.
